name: standardize
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to make things of the same type all have the same basic features

example.eg: We standardize parts such as rear-view mirrors, so that one type will fit any model of car we make.
example.egtrans: 我们对后视镜之类的零部件进行标准化生产，这样只要一种型号便能匹配我们制造的所有款式的汽车了。

example.eg: The profile summarizes key information about a product in a standardized format designed to make it easier to compare products.
example.egtrans: 产品介绍包含产品的一些关键信息，用一种专门格式写成，以便在产品之间进行比较。
